name: ordir
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wb(wo(wa(w0, w1), w2), wa(wo(w0, w2), wo(w1, w2)))

stmt.origin: 3bitr4i(wo(wa(w0, w1), w2), wa(wo(w0, w2), wo(w1, w2)), wo(w2, wa(w0, w1)), wa(wo(w2, w0), wo(w2, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wo(wa(w0, w1), w2), wa(wo(w0, w2), wo(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wo(w2, wa(w0, w1)), wa(wo(w2, w0), wo(w2, w1)))
-| wb(wo(wa(w0, w1), w2), wo(w2, wa(w0, w1)))
-| wb(wa(wo(w0, w2), wo(w1, w2)), wa(wo(w2, w0), wo(w2, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wo(wa(w0, w1), w2), wa(wo(w0, w2), wo(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wo(w2, wa(w0, w1)), wa(wo(w2, w0), wo(w2, w1)))
-| wb(wo(wa(w0, w1), w2), wo(w2, wa(w0, w1)))
-| wb(wa(wo(w0, w2), wo(w1, w2)), wa(wo(w2, w0), wo(w2, w1)))

body.origin: |- wb(wo(w2, wa(w0, w1)), wa(wo(w2, w0), wo(w2, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wo(wa(w0, w1), w2), wa(wo(w0, w2), wo(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wo(wa(w0, w1), w2), wo(w2, wa(w0, w1)))
-| wb(wa(wo(w0, w2), wo(w1, w2)), wa(wo(w2, w0), wo(w2, w1)))

body.origin: |- wb(wo(wa(w0, w1), w2), wo(w2, wa(w0, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wo(wa(w0, w1), w2), wa(wo(w0, w2), wo(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wa(wo(w0, w2), wo(w1, w2)), wa(wo(w2, w0), wo(w2, w1)))

stmt.origin: anbi12i(wo(w0, w2), wo(w1, w2), wo(w2, w0), wo(w2, w1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wa(wo(w0, w2), wo(w1, w2)), wa(wo(w2, w0), wo(w2, w1)))
-| wb(wo(w0, w2), wo(w2, w0))
-| wb(wo(w1, w2), wo(w2, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wo(wa(w0, w1), w2), wa(wo(w0, w2), wo(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wo(w0, w2), wo(w2, w0))
-| wb(wo(w1, w2), wo(w2, w1))

|- wb(wo(wa(w0, w1), w2), wa(wo(w0, w2), wo(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wo(w1, w2), wo(w2, w1))
|- wb(wo(wa(w0, w1), w2), wa(wo(w0, w2), wo(w1, w2)))

comment: Distributive law for disjunction. (Contributed by NM, 12-Aug-1994.)
